org.springframework.security.acls.domain
Class BasePermission

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.security.acls.domain.AbstractPermission
      org.springframework.security.acls.domain.BasePermission
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Permission
public class BasePermission
extends AbstractPermission

A set of standard permissions.

You may subclass this class to add additional permissions, or use this class as a guide for creating your own permission classes.

Version:
$Id: BasePermission.java 3269 2008-09-05 04:33:52Z benalex $
